subject: fix: enable PWA updates on pull-to-refresh and page reload
body:
Added controllerchange listener to auto-reload when new service worker
takes control, visibilitychange listener to check for updates when
returning to the app, and updated checkForUpdate() to reload instead
of telling users to close and reopen.
